review: While the doctors and hospital is really good. The wait time runs 2-3 hours. Today in my case , i remained seated in front of reception , they assumed i was elsewhere and doctor left for ‚Äúpocedure‚Äù . Most of the staff went for lunch in front of me , none of them bothered to tell us that doctor is away please go eat , we arrived at 1 on time but kept waiting till 3 pm . When asked when will doctor see me , the response i got is we do not know you‚Äôll have to wait. I understand sometimes it‚Äôs an emergency but the courtesy to inform the patient on wait time and next steps is what a patient in need needs. Go with an attitude of constantly reminding and checking on your consultation status otherwise you‚Äôll end up waiting forever.
Didn't explain properly and misguided. Didn't explain the situation well. Even after scaning didn't confirm on pregnancy.

review: Vandana man is just awesome. I have conceived after 8months of treatment for my 1 child and delivery was also done in Hegde itself. And for second child,I went to another doctor with in Hegde hospital. I conceived in first visit but by bad luck and it was aborted in 20days. Again I consulted Dr. Vandana and used her prescribed medications  and conceived after 2months. Now Iam blessed with 2kids. Very happy with Dr.Vandana's treatment. She understands problem and body only then she prescribes medicine.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited Dr vandana mam, underwent IVF treatment and conceived in the first cycle,  thanks to doctor for this good news.  Very happy.  Staff at hedge suchitra branch are very prompt,  very good receiving and helpful.  Thank u doctor once again for making our dream of parenthood a reality.

Dr Vandana helped demyth many assumptions I had regarding PCOS and hormonal imbalance. She was friendly, heard everything I had to say and even answered every single question I had. 
The best part for me was the detailed explanation on the 'WHY' behind my issues. She did not just give me a diagnosis, but helped me understand all aspects regarding that.
